name: Gensys Video Format
summary: Learn about .GVF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Thermal imaging is (typically) the process of detecting the long-infrared radiation that objects emit and producing color-coded images of those emissions. This allows those viewing thermal images to "see" temperature variations between and within objects.
Gensys Genvision is a thermal imaging software suite that allows users to capture thermal imaging videos. It saves these videos, and accompanying data about detected emissions, as GVF files.

instructions: You can open a GVF file with Gensys GVF Viewer (Windows), which is included with Gensys Genvision.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
